data.name: Achromatic
data.detailed_description:
Achromatic is a first-person horror puzzle game where the player takes the role of a hired technician who has been called in to repair a faulty carousel. Upon entering the carnival however, they find that there is more wrong here than a couple loose wires, and they find that the biggest challenge they will have is escaping the carnival in one piece.

Features Of This Game
  • Immersive Experience: Prepare for a night at the carnival, don't forget to stop by the carousel before heading into the funhouse!
  • Haunting Environments: Beware of the funhouse, and who lurks inside
  • Terrifying Monsters: Two monstrous enemies who will chase you down

data.short_description: Achromatic is a first-person horror puzzle game â€” Walk around the carnival you have been tasked with repairing and uncover the darker secrets that lie within. Solve puzzles and avoid the carnival workers as you try to escape.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: x64 Based Windows 8 and up
  • Processor: Quad-Core 2.5GHz x64-compatible
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 960 (AMD RX 470 equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: x64 Based Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz x64-compatible
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

Recommended:

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of player character death, depictions of blood
